name: Out of Control (Fmlad)
description:
Minigame Jam 74 / Develop a game within 48 hours!
Theme: Chaos
Limitation:  Limited to only using inputs  A, X, SPACE, 8, P

Out of Control
Side scroller lemmings type game where pressing a button the appropriate buttons to get by.

Art/Animation/Coding/ BGM Music : Fmlad
Sound Effects: freesounds.org

Note: There is a little inconsistent bug where you cannot run off the platform properly, it happens like 20% of the time and I dont know why.. After 4-5 attemtps a pity system will take over and spawn you at the end :) Keep trying till pity kicks in :)
